## About Me
[**Kevin Xu**](https://github.com/K3vX21/) is currently a student that resides in Naperville, Illinois (Class of '22, Naperville North High School).

## About the Project
This project explores the relationships and trends for ATP Matches, predominately singles matches. It was created as part of [Kane’s Free High School Data Science Bootcamp](https://bootcamp.davidkane.info/).

### Goals
* Explore demographic changes in the game
* Explore style-of-game shifts in the game
